channel.title: Live Video Picture in Picture etc Tool mmhmm.app
channel.description: Today in the check in call @Jerry and I discussed [Open Broadcast Software](https://obsproject.com/) to do picture in Picture. Here is a new one that looks more specific to our needs and easier to use https://www.mmhmm.app/

item.description:
